Detailed Description

Base class for applying actions to subtotalling

Member Function Documentation

TotalAction::apply (  ) 

Apply action

Returns:
[boolean] true if the action completes successfully (or is not necessary at all) or [string] url to redirect to another page for further decisions/input.

Reimplemented in ArOverpayAction, AutoCoupon, and OntarioMealTaxRebateAction.
